text: Serhiy Strashnenko (; 8 September 1953) is a former professional Soviet football goalkeeper and coach. ==References == ==External links== * * Kuzmiak, L. Serhiy Strashnenko: "After the aviation disaster with "Pakhtakor", players of the renewed squad were afraid to ascend to skies" (Сергій СТРАШНЕНКО: «Після авіакатастрофи «Пахтакора» гравці оновленого складу боялися здійматися в небо»). title: Serhiy Strashnenko
